title: World Countries

api_list.description: Get the list of cities in world

api_list.name: Country Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-countries1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/countries/{code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-countries1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: City Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-countries1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/cities/{geonameid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-countries1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
